content.description: Sit start hugging the arete with a great right hand. Go left following the interesting holds with a cryptic crux. Follow the good holds to top out on the left.
content.location: Back side of Fox Tail on the adjacent boulder.

content.description: Start under the roof with a left hand three finger pocket and right hand sloper. Power up to a good hold and enjoy nicely sculpted holds up the face to the top. The original project starting at the base of the roof broke and now doesn’t appear to go.
content.location: The obvious low roof to the right of Trash Panda and behind the start to Habitat for Humility

content.description: Sit start on the far left on some good hold and go straight up. Top out.
content.location: On the far left with a boulder near your back but plenty of space for a spotter if you need one.

content.description: Stand start, and climb obvious holds on the overhanging face to the right of Trash Panda. Decent holds for the grade, but lack of feet make this thing brutal.
content.location: The face immediately right of Trash Panda

content.description: Begin on Habitat for Humility and trend right. Topout on the arete. Slightly highball topout is easier than it looks.
Sit start on crimps. Go straight up and top out.
content.location: This line is in between Deer Season and Rabbit Season

content.description: Begin with an obvious sit start in a right hand blocky hold and a left hand slot. Climb across the obvious rail and then straight up the overhanging face using an absolutely disgusting crimp, and crank up to a perfect incut edge, shaped like a gym hold….suits those who love nasty crimps and have good flexibility.
content.protection: Two pads- one on the ground and one hanging on the boulder behind the problem.
content.location: Sit start, located to the right ofTrash Panda, beginning under the roof and trending right across the obvious rail.

content.description:
Sit start on good hold while sitting on make shift landing with logs between boulders. Make your way up good holds to get to a sloppy top out for the much desired beached whale top out. Make sure you have your friends take lots of picture of this because it will be a great look for social media posts. ;)

But seriously spot your friends on this boulder.
content.location: West face on the right most line about 10 feet from the far right arete

content.description: Sit start on ledge in the back of the cave go straight out of the roof and top out.
